title: Flyout Directly Download
description:
Flyout is an aircraft building game with an emphasis on design freedom and realistic physics, sound and effects. Use the in-game modeling tools to create an aircraft of any shape, add and configure engines for your needs, set up control surfaces and take your design on a test flight around an earth-sized procedurally generated planet.
This game is not easy. There are no in-game tutorials and tool tips are limited due to Early Access status. Fuselage editing is similar to modeling in any 3D software, although much simplified. There will be bugs due to the highly unrestricted editor and Early Access status of the game. Basic understanding of aircraft physics and flight controls is required or at least recommended .

system_requirements.Processor: AMD Athlon X4 845, Intel Core i5 6400
